prompt:
A boldly seductive adult Korean woman in her 20s on a poolside sunbed, golden hour editorial,
mid-to-full body framing.
Pose: seated sideways, legs crossed with one knee raised, hips angled; one hand gripping the
chair back, torso subtly arched.
Expression: dominant gaze, half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Swimwear: textured bikini (matte ribbed), realistic fit and tension lines.
Lighting: side light + tabletop/stone bounce, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
Exclude text/logos; no nudity; no pornographic framing.
